attributes.action: Extend the train line from Lichfield Trent Valley to Burton on Trent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The number of buses in use between Lichfield and Burton is very few. Some services do not include the village of Fradley. Taking into account that not everyone has a car, one option would be to extend the train line from Lichfield Trent Valley to Burton on Trent.
A train station could be built near Hilliards Cross which would serve Fradley, and one in Alrewas which would also serve the National Arboretum.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Extend the train line from Lichfield Trent Valley to Burton on Trent."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18409


Prime Minister's Office
